comment: Overall a good professor. Clear grading criteria. 100 question tests (4 tests total) with each test being 75-25 multiple choice-truefalse.

Helluva nice guy. If you're looking for an easy grade this is your guy. However, if you actually care about the material I wouldn't take him. You're pretty much on your own. Tests were pretty easy too.
Expects us to just know what he's talking about. Instead of actually teaching he used the video that came with the book so we could watch them teach as he just sat in his chair.

Professor Thomas was pretty rude to most people in the class and couldn't explain the material at all. He expected us to understand perfectly after he stumbled through one example. The good thing was that he threw out a lot of grades or gave make up assignments. However, in doing this no one really got to learn anything. Do not take him.
Class is not always exciting, but you will learn if you pay attention.  Tests are kinda ugly, but he curves. he's a good teacher and he cares about his students.

This is the one class I struggled with the entire semester, the teacher does anything but teach. We go over one example in class and the entire test is over that one example, not clear at all in notes or what is expected on tests, if he is not mocking you he is saying something condescending to the class. Does give lots of extra credit though.
Great teacher, easy A if u do ur work... he lets u make up some tests and lets u drop a grade. If u do ur work...u r guaranteed an A!!!!!!
